Package com.sri.ai.expresso.helper

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractExpressionWrapper
    A implementation of Expression that redirects methods to an inner Expression.
    Apply
    A function mapping expressions to application of a given functor to them.
    ExpressionComparator
    An Expression Comparator.
    ExpressionIsSymbolOfType
    A Predicate indicating whether an expression is a symbolic one whose value is an instance of a given class.
    Expressions
    A class of helper methods for Expressions.
    FunctionApplicationContainsArgumentSatisfying
    Indicates whether a given expression, assumed to be a function application, has an argument satisfying a given predicate.
    FunctorAndIthArgumentEqual
    Given an expression f, an integer i and an expression a, indicates whether a given expression has functor equal to f, and i-th argument equal to a.
    GetFunctorOrSymbol
    A Function mapping an expression to the same value returned by Expression.getFunctorOrSymbol().
    GetSyntaxTree
    A Function that returns the syntax tree of a given expression on application.
    GetValue
    A unary function returning the value of an atomic expression.
    IsFunctionApplication
    A Predicate that determines if a given expression is a function application.
    IsSubExpressionOf
    A (@link Predicate} that determines if on application a given expression is a sub-expression of an expression given on instantiation.
    MapReplacementFunction
    Replacement function f(x) based on a map m such that f(x) = map.get(x) if the map contains x, or x itself otherwise.
    SomeArgumentIsEqualTo
    A (@link Predicate} that determines if a given expression on application is the member of the arguments of a expression given at application.
    SubExpressionsDepthFirstIterator
    An iterator ranging over all sub-expressions of an expression, including itself.
    SyntaxTrees
    A class of helper methods for SyntaxTrees.
